cliArguments.keys: The text to type into the element.
cliArguments.clear: Clears the element value, before typing into it.
cliArguments.forceClear: Clears the element value using <backspace> key, performing the clearing using real keyboard actions. This action is not supported on [mobile-native] applications.
cliArguments.interval: The interval time between each character typing.
cliArguments.down: Array of keys to press down while sending keys (use for simulate [ctrl]+a, [ctrl]+[shift]+[delete], etc.

description: Simulates typing text into the element. This actions supports typing interval and various clearing options.

examples.description: Type [Alexander] into [//form//p/input[1]] text input, after clearing the existing value.
Simulates a keys combination of [ctrl]+a (a, c, v, etc. must be lower case).
Type [Alexander] into [//form//p/input[1]] text input, after clearing the existing value using real keyboard actions.
Type [Alexander] into [//form//p/input[1]] text input with [100ms] interval between each char.

name: SendKeys

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.argument: The text to type into the element.

summary: Simulates typing text into the element.
